website_summaries.verdict: A collapsible cart that boasts expert craftsmanship and multiple storage levels.
pros: Includes dual-material handles that are comfortable and enable you to maintain a firm grip
Provides three levels for holding a broad array of items
Rubber swivel wheels are well-constructed and provide outstanding mobility
Ideal in any home, office, or garage
cons: Bearings sometimes fall off the wheels
Handle may snap off the cart

customer_reviews.title: makes my day easier
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart, removed the middle tray for my needs as a a/v tech, and even hang my ladder and roll it over long distances . I use it as a work bench when it's not carrying everything into the job site, and it comes fully built and folds very easily when the day is over. People always ask me where to get one . Highly recommended for those that can't haul a full size cart and need to move a bunch of tools around , or need a portable laptop table .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great cart, great size.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cart to do product demonstrations in stores. It holds a lot and rolls easily. I keep it in the back of my SUV. I folds up easily. I have also used it for catering. It holds full large aluminum pans with out a problem. The only thing to remember is to push the lock down or it will fold up when you are rolling it.
customer_reviews.author: wilanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it as a medical cart :)
customer_reviews.text: Super thankful for this cart. I use it for my daughter's medical supplies. And I like it because I can roll everything she needs alongside of her wheelchair. I spent so much time unpacking and repacking after her appointments or school days. Grateful that this seems to be working for us. :) I priced a lot of different carts and decided on this one due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Erb

customer_reviews.title: Wow - it's my favorite Amazon purchase now
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this cart and wow... It's collapses so easy and fast, fits perfectly in my trunk. Its not meant to carry extra heavy or super big items, but excellent to move things around in 1 trip. Watch my demo video.
customer_reviews.author: aparra

customer_reviews.title: Worst wheels and handle
customer_reviews.text: I will be receiving my third one as the first one I received did not work out of the box. One of the wheel would not turn and it would create drag marks on the floor if your tried rolling it. Got a replacement one and first time using it the handle broke and one of wheels broke off. So, stay away and learn from my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not super excited about this....
customer_reviews.text: food was stuck to it, dried liquid, sticky stuff. not happy. it folds and unfolds pretty easy, do not expect to have it folded and have it stand up. I got this to move 1 gal water jugs. the cart can hold 6 on each shelf so saves me a ton of walking and time but..... it feels very unstable with only 14 jugs on it.... cracks in the sidewalk almost tip it over. i learned it is better to pull than it is to push but...... not the quality and sturdiness I would have expected from this product....
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lock closed to store vertically.
customer_reviews.text: Does not lock closed. States in product description and on product that it does but there is no mechanism for it to even lock closed so it’s s blatant lie. I guess buy it if you will store it only laying down but it’s useless as is if you plan to store it vertically.
customer_reviews.author: ndimension

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The cart fell a part very fast. First screws started to get lost. Then the supports stick got broken and after other parts fell a part. I do food catering. I did not use it for heavy carrying. The only benefit was folding. It fits in your car. I was happy in the beginning. If you use it on the street, wheels get stuck on the cracks because they are small. I used it may be 10 times and threw it to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: tuncho

customer_reviews.title: Portable!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Very portable for transportation - Good amount of weight that it can hold. 65lb max. - Durable quality Cons: - Wobbly! - Can still be moved from side to side, even with the wheels locked - Wheels are horrible! Doesn't roll smoothly or in straight lines! You are better off replacing them. - Folding is not smooth, requires a bit of force for mine. May have gotten a faulty screw one. - At this price point, would be nice if it included a integrated power outlet
customer_reviews.author: dx

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect....just missing some parts.
customer_reviews.text: This cart came to us without the mechanism to lock it into the folded position, falling dangerously back out into the open position. From other reviews, it looks like the mechanism is two separate velcro straps. If we could be sent these so we don't have to send the whole thing back, that would be great?! Otherwise, it's a perfect solution for my mechanic, with low-friction wheels for a smooth transfer. It was already assembled, at least this one had nothing extra found inside the box it came in, if that's where the straps were supposed to be put. It's a shame because I would have given it 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and collapsed in the middle during first use
customer_reviews.text: The cart arrived with a big piece of plastic broken off the edge of the top shelf. We used it to transfer multiple bottles of liquor from one room in our office to another. We immediately noticed the wheels do not turn easily at all, so it struggled to even turn a corner. The packaging said it holds up to 150 lbs. We were carrying way less weight than that when it collapsed in the middle, causing the bottles to fall off and juice to spill all over our carpet. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Berry

customer_reviews.title: Just opened the box 10 min ago...
customer_reviews.text: ... and I immediately know that I'm comfortable with laying down 5 stars for this. Slid product out of box, and it smoothly and easily opened into the item as described. There was no weird maneuvering required, the cart opened up without catching, the wheels glide nicely over carpet, and all the materials are sturdy and well put-together. I'm usually pretty lazy about leaving reviews, but this exceeded my expectations that I knew I had to post something right away. (I was actually about to order a 2nd one but it looks like the price shot up ten bucks in the last few days so I may wait. LOL.)
customer_reviews.author: Nisi

customer_reviews.title: 150 lb Capacity Service Cart helps carrying to and from the car
customer_reviews.text: This has been as useful as I expected. It folds so it doesn't take up a lot of room in my garage. It's easy to open and close. In spite of a couple of issues, it is a great product. 1. Be sure to push down on the handle to "lock" it open. The second time I used it, I forgot and it folded up when I ran into a bump. 2. The wheels should be a bit bigger. It is not easy to push over a door sill or other small obstacle; I must lift the leading edge to get it over.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stows easily, smooth rolling, and too small for a mechanic's tool table
customer_reviews.text: I like the Olympia Tools 85-188 Pack-N-Roll's smooth rolling castors and wheels. It's very compact when it's stowed. It's sturdy, with no wobble or flex in the frame. When it's open and locked, the frame holds everything in tension and it feels solid. It's too small to use as a mechanic's tool table. There's not enough room for all the tools I use *and* the parts I'm removing and replacing. The 85-189 XL version is a better fit for a DIY mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and easy to move like it’s on ice!!! A+++++++**
customer_reviews.text: Can fully assemble. Roll very easy like it’s on ice. I am a vendor and do not always have access to a utility cart at some stores. I got this today and used it and was amazed how sturdy and ease to move around in the aisles. I expected a flimsy thing but was hugely surprised. I can also use this for gardening. I LOVE THIS CART AND YOU WILL TOO!!!! I do not work for nor affiliated with amazon or this seller so my review is real. EASILY FOLDS UP AND IS SURPRISINGLY LITE TO PULL OUT OF MY TRUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Litzinger

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked on the top shelf
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when my cart arrived. When I opened the box, I heard pieces hit the floor. The cart was cracked on the top shelf and three pieces fell off. However, I only found two out of three pieces and glued them on the cart. I'm really disappointed because I had high hopes for this cart based on the reviews. I hope this cart holds up.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I got one for the place I work. Started using the heck out of it. I kept finding more uses for it, it's so easy to use, the seam in the middle is tight, the cart is very stable, and rolls smoothly. I had to get one for myself. Just used it when I was barbequing to hold meats, marinade, and my barbeque tools. When I work on our vehicles outside, I just pop open the cart and go. It opens easily, and stores in a small space in the closet. I highly recommend this, so many uses beyond the obvious.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dahne

customer_reviews.title: You can take my money
customer_reviews.text: It comes out of the box ready to go. No assembly required. Runs smooth. Pushed it 3 blocks down 5th ave with no problem. Just wish it was bigger. I tried laying a CPR dummy on top and it won’t fit. I also wish it was higher. I am 5’4 and I have to bend slightly to push it from behind. Kind of uncomfortable. But it can take a lot of weight. Placed a Zoll machine on top no problem. Thought of buying the next size up but it’s $200. Why the big jump in price?! But overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Please take my money

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've read other reviews about folding stability challenges. That's not a concern for me. Primary interest is durability, stability, and to a lesser degree movability. So, far durability looks very good. Movability is a bit of a challenge when fully loaded, as mine is with many toolboxes. All within weight limits per shelf and overall. Stability seems good, although there's more movement in the cart than I'd prefer while occasionally moving it. Still, very good overall. Really suited my needs and space. Recommended, with the limitations described. Packaging was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Street Archives

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful cart
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cart because we were moving to an senior apartment with no carts to help us move in or for bringing groceries to the second floor. It has been helpful in both regards. It works better to pull it because if you try to push it, it tends to fold up dumping what you have on it. It folds fairly easy. The best part is we can take it with us in the trunk because it folds up and we use it when we bring items up to the apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Fredericktonian

customer_reviews.title: cart in theory was as expected however the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: cart in theory was as expected however the first time it was used the handle on one side separated from the center grip. my wife loves the cart for it's ease of maneuverability and size for her traveling art cart in school. i made a comment about this regarding packaging but it hasn't appeared to get the seller's attention. my hope is that we resolve this after i make this post. i honestly believe it is the result of a manufacturing issue and not design.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Heilbrunn

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly required!! PERFECT little sturdy cart!!
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a tall big box! I thought I was going to have to assemble the cart, but you just slide it out and unfold it! It's perfect!! On the smaller side vs. a commercial utility cart, but it's perfect for my soap making supplies to cart back and forth! It's sturdy and has a brace on the back of it to keep it from folding up. I feel it was a little more on the expensive side for the size however I am definitely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lintz

customer_reviews.title: Great for production station
customer_reviews.text: I use this cart for my portable production station. I have a small 4 channel mixer, my laptop, and am able to set up without leaving my stuff all over the location. Also when I'm doing mobile photography shoots, I use my laptop to tether and place it on my cart. When I'm at an event that requires on location printing, I have my printer on the bottom. I'm not sure $100 is the correct pricing, however it is sturdy and if it were made cheaper then it would be definitely a bad deal. Maybe I'm just cheap and I know how $100 can go far when it comes to film and recording production.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly R James

customer_reviews.title: Very well made service cart that easily fold up for compact storage
customer_reviews.text: Very well made service cart that easily fold up for compact storage. I've wanted a service cart for a while to use when detailing the family vehicles. I looked for a couple of years but never bought one because I really don't have the room in my garage for something that would only get occasional use. I never thought to look for a foldable cart. Then I found this. It seemed too goo to be true. I bought it and love it. It helps tremendously for all my driveway projects. provides a nice stable platform to work from. Provides everything I need at a price lower than the fixed carts I was looking at before.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigOldDog

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this at the beginning of the year. Didn’t start to use it until March. Been using it five days a week for work. Let me say very disappointed with it. Went to use it today and the screws that hold the first and second shelves have fallen off. Now can’t use it anymore. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made for condo Living.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made since I moved into our condo. Living in an elevator building, having a cart was a necessity to get groceries from the parking lot to our unit. I chose this type of cart because it has three shelves and I can load up with more groceries and cases of water etc. It easily folds up nicely and with stage behind the passenger seat in my car. Easily folds down and locks into place and has sturdy wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I am a freelance filmmaker so I do a lot of work and work with a lot of equipment on my own. This cart is small and portable which is what I loved! However, it is not the best sturdy thing around so can’t overload it with a lot of heavy stuff... so if you don’t have too much heavy equipment, go ahead and get it but if you have several heavy things as I do... maybe look for something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bearings fell out of wheels 2nd time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Bearings fell out of wheels 2nd time I used it. No one to contact for replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.author: lockwoodtv

customer_reviews.title: I think this will be perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: My cart arrived yesterday and I think it will be the answer to my vendor event issues. The cart was fully assembled, folds and unfolds easily, is lightweight, and will stand alone while folded. All of my supplies fit perfectly. This will be my cash box, shopping bag, literature stand and an extra side table for my shows, which will give me extra room for products on my product table. I can't wait to try it out in two weeks. It is nicely made! So excited!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Eads

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good. Shelves a pretty thin.
customer_reviews.text: This cart is super easy to unfold. Folding it back up is a little trickier but not difficult. It's very easy to smash/pinch a finger when folding it up, so be careful. It dose not want to stay closed so I have to put a bungee cord around. My main complaint is how thin and flimsy the shelves are. It takes almost no pressure or weight for them to start bending.
customer_reviews.author: Ohana Films

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial electrician and have been looking at getting my own cart for a while now. Having recently traded my truck in for a car, i decided to give this one a try since it folds. I love it, it is smaller than most carts you see on jobsites but it is mine and i can't imagine not having it with me now. Several people have asked me where i got it. It is not nearly as sturdy as most non folding carts but that was expected. I really couldn't ask for more for the price
customer_reviews.author: DancingManatee

customer_reviews.title: VERY poor quality. Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelves tube and wheels broke after 4 light uses. Says 300lb limit. I only put 150 on it split amongst 3 shelves. Contacted customer service of course no response. Have to dump it. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !!
customer_reviews.text: what a sweet deal ! this unit is very well constructed, and was very well protected in shipping. there is absolutely NO assembly needed. this cart folds and when in use ....has a locking bar that keeps it from folding. i read all the reviews prior to purchasing, and i dont know what angle these people were playing. this is a great value /bargain for the money. yes i would purchase again.......this would be great for work !
customer_reviews.author: edwierd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: One of my hobbies is working on cars, frequently on a lift. I could never seem to keep my tools organized or consolidated in one spot. I bought this to cure this and ease my back pain from reaching down to my garage floor for tools. The size is perfect, the construction sturdy enough and it folds! The icing on the cake was that it arrived very well packed and completely assembled and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: BWC III

customer_reviews.title: Quality has sunk. Wish this thing stayed together.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased my share of these and use them for work. One of the biggest observations has been the quality of these have gone down. I have an issue with the wheels and also the bolts that hold it when folding are always coming loose and falling out no matter how many times I put them back in and tighten them. I do have one from about 3 years ago that is still in great condition with the same usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ruebixcube

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: As a person living with a disability, I bought this cart to help me safely and efficiently move items throughout my homes’ main floor. I use it to help empty the dishwasher, restock pantry items, get food from the refrigerator to the counter or any other chore on my list of things to do that a healthy person could do unaided. It’s pretty easy for me to fold up and tuck away if I need to but, as empty nesters, not too bulky to leave out opened up. A little difficult to open by myself. The maneuverability is great. Three nice-sized shelves. Sturdy. Smooth. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cart that has proven more useful than expected. The relatively large wheels are smooth and the cart is highly maneuverable. It has proven so useful that I have kept it open and have not used the folding feature much. However, it does fold nicely and can be stored easily in a relatively small space. The only disadvantage is that the folding mechanism blocks one side so the lower shelves can only be loaded from the other side. But that is a minor price to pay for the easy storage aspect. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican

customer_reviews.title: over a year later and it stilll rocks
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a little bit of everything: groceries, company supplies, short term storage. Just about daily use, not gentle, and it looks and maneuvers the same as when I purchased it.Then when I'm done? Fold and store. I have a disability, still folding and pulling back out is not a prob. I love it still, rely on it constantly and would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding cart!
customer_reviews.text: I was wary about buying this... it seemed too good to be true! A lightweight cart that is sturdy? It is true, though. Lots of room and the best part was that I did not need to assemble it. It just folded neatly out. I felt the price was very reasonable. The only issue I had was when I locked it in place. There is a bar that you fold down above the "V." The locking mechanism happened so fast, one of my fingers got stuck. (ouch!) For that reason, I will probably not collapse it too often. Otherwise, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found this cart. I, too, use a cane. When you have one hand holding a cane and you are trying to keep your balance, there is not much you can carry, then you end up making multiple trips to get the job done, and your exhausted. I immediately opened the box when it arrived, removed the cart, and started using it. I don't need an industrial strength cart, I needed something to help me with daily chores. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cart for contractors on small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart in 2015 and it's still being used today. The only thing that recently went were the castors. I upgraded to rollerblade style castors with bearings with very little modification. I usually load about 50-60 lbs of tools with no problems. With it loaded up you kinda have to pull instead of push because a small crack in the road or a small rock it will want to tip over. Other than that it's the perfect folding cart for smaller jobsites and I always get asked by other trades where I bought it at.
customer_reviews.author: dvs-SS

customer_reviews.title: worked great right out of the box (and it was a big box)
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required. I immediately took the cart out of the box and put it right to use. It's not what you'd call rock-solid (not for heavy material handling, not made of steel or anything) but for its intended purpose it doesn't have to be. Right now I'm using it to move a computer and equipment around but I know this'll work just as well in the workshop. Size is great and despite the impressive box it arrived in, it's extremely portable; once folded you can carry it anywhere or store it under just about anything. It's the perfect tool for the job I needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Selling a used piece of equipment as new???
customer_reviews.text: Olympia Tools selling used/returned/damaged products as new? Say it isn‘t so! Wheels are marred, shelves are DIRTY AND SCRATCHED... no way. Not nice. NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sartori (fka Gaedeke)

customer_reviews.title: Only used once but really like for carrying testing equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart for my business. We do a lot of line sweeping and RF testing and use a remote battery pack for power. This cart came in super handy to carry the battery pack and tools. The wheels are a little stiff to start but seemed to loosen up. It doesn't push perfectly stright, but for what we are using it for (pushing maybe 30 feet at a time) it's no big deal. Like anything, keep weight balanced. I had it nearly tip when trying to push over a doorway. I do recommend for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Allen A

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a lot easier!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cart. No assembly required, was able to use it right out of the box. Easy to fold with just one hand. I can use it for so many things and store it away in a small space. Originally purchased it for doing laundry. This made it easy to fold and put everything away. But I realized I'll be using it for entertaining as well. I deliver food to my kids when they get sick, it fits next to their beds. The possibilities are endless..... It also moves perfectly across my wood floors without scratching them.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald City

customer_reviews.title: Great product for multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. I purchased it for my 89 yr old mom who lives with us. She loves to cook, however, with our big kitchen it was hard for her to carry items to and from the sink to the stove so we got this for her to use. It's light weight and gives her Xtra support when walking back and forth. Only gave 3 star on assemble because once we open it up and lock it in place, my mom can't unlock it by herself. It is kind of hard to pull up without help. Also, the locks on the wheels really don't work. Otherwise, this product it perfect for what we bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Boot-Nut

customer_reviews.title: Often complimented
customer_reviews.text: I live in an appartment with an additional storage room in the basement. I use this cart to take things to and from the storage room. It is great because I can fold it up and put in a closet in the appartment. Several times I've been in the elevator and gotten compliments and pointed people to Amazon to go out and purchase one of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Sutherlin

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: I must like it. I bought two. Do not regret it either. The cart locks out when unfolded and is actually a lot more sturdy than I expected. It rolls well, and was put to use almost immediately after getting it unboxed. It stores easily in a corner (or beside a washing machine, like one of mine is), under a bed, or just about anywhere once it's folded up. It's a bit pricey for it being made of plastic. But, as long as you don't need it to cary/hold anything heavy, then it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Turnmire

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to have to assemble this cart and was unbelievably relieved that there was NO assembly required. It is sturdy, roomy enough for my needs with the three shelves, and so far rolls nicely (without weight). I’m very pleased with the quality and the price I paid. Did I mention I’m THRILLED it arrived fully assembled? Yesss!
customer_reviews.author: ZoomM3

customer_reviews.title: Could use some improvements. Already thinking about returning it to china where it was made.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are smooth and it's portable cart. What I dislike about the cart is that you CANNOT lock it in the closed position. So it unfolds on its own when you're carrying it around. Like what the f. Come on guys really. Ain't nobody got time for it flopping all over the place. Still deciding whether I should return it or use my wire tie to keep it locked like shown in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Tray isn't quite as big as description says, overall good cart that folds nicely
customer_reviews.text: This cart works very well and was super easy to open up, but I find the handle height a little low for me when pushing (I'm 5'8") and the tray is slightly smaller than the stated measurements, which means the machine I wanted to put on top doesn't quite fit! So disappointing since I measured it before ordering to make sure it'd fit!! The middle handles on the tray also cut into the tray interior space just enough to cut down the space too. I don't have it overloaded with weight, so I haven't had any issues with the wheels. I love the fact it collapses and will store in a small area, so that's a big bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Benner

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile for twice the price
customer_reviews.text: We've drug carts to job sites before, but they take up a lot of space in a vehicle and they have to be the last thing unloaded and there first thing loaded, which is a pain. This folding cart will easily fit in the back of a small Subaru wagon and barely costs more than our plastic cart that isn't worth the bother. Plus if you keep it folded in the shop it won't be full of stuff when you need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Viewer

customer_reviews.title: SO handy to have
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over 2 years, and it still works like a champ. First I used it at my job and it was a lifesaver, even hauling cases of copy paper. Now I use it whenever there's a large haul of groceries or whatever. It folds neatly & is not too heavy for me to lift or too bulky to put in the back seat or trunk. (Well, of my old Grand Marquis, that's a bigger car.)
customer_reviews.author: SquirrelFriend

customer_reviews.title: Lost Crucial Screws after Single Use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cart for folding up and taking with on floral jobs, and felt like it was worth the almost $100 price tag, but was really upset to see when i went to use it the second time that some very crucial screws to allowing it to fold were missing. Unfortunately it is now just slightly past the 30 days return window. Really wanted to like this cart and really disappointed it broke so fast. Maybe send extra screws for this with future orders?
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: So I really like the idea of this and it does fold well and store. The brakes do not really work though it will not hold. Unfortunate because I’m using it in my house and my toddler just wants to roll it around. If I would have known the breaks didn’t work I probably would not have purchased
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty good, it has wheels that assist in moving ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty good, it has wheels that assist in moving from one place to another, (where it is going to be used out-of-doors to store and move gardening tools and other plants uses. It really hasn't been put into use yet, as I'm (in my spare time) trying to modify it so each level will have walls on three sides, so items don't easily fall out. At this point I've used some fabric, and have taped it to the corner pieces. If it works successfully, I'll sew or snap together around the legs. I've got to get it done so my wife can get out there while there's still sun in the sky.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Useful, lightweight, sturdy, a little short.
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery I received was missing Hardware. Amazon customer service did a great job replacing the cart. It is compact, and folds down into a nice slim package. It is definitely a little low to the ground, and I wish the company made extensions oh, so that it would be easier for tall people to use. That having been written, I may just make some myself. I cannot comment on the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Polymathena

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the recommended weight limitations!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cart daily transporting things to and from the kitchen where I work. It folds up nicely to fit in my car and is easy to unfold. It is easy to overload it though and then it is difficult to maneuver, especially if there are any bumps or thresholds to cross. All in all it serves my needs, but this would not be the cart you want if you have a lot of heavy items to load on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Whatever you do, it does also!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product. I am a facilities manager for a large movie theater and am always on the go, fixing different things all the time. Having a cart helps with not having to carry my tool bag on one shoulder all the time and the cart acts like a table also. This cart is very durable, lightweight, has no troubles over little bumps, the height of the middle and bottom shelves are perfect for cans of paint, and just the right height for a standard bottle of drain cleaner. My only complaint is, the cart is a little difficult to carry when collapsed. It wants to always open up again. I just bungee it now.
customer_reviews.author: Facilities Manager

customer_reviews.title: The product you can use in any room of the home.
customer_reviews.text: I like the industrial look of the cart. I read the reviews and most customers bought it for the garage. I use it in my dining room and it looks great. I also purchased it used and saved I think close to 40 bucks. There’s no set up. Out of the box press down a couple of hinges and it’s done. It is bulky and a little heavy, So you might need another person for getting it out of the box. It is a heavy duty cart. I don’t know if I would’ve purchased it for the full price because there were other choices for me. I was lucky it came to me as though it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: lois s.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR CLASS-TO-CLASS ART OR MUSIC ENRICHMENT
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart for bringing fine arts to each classroom. My only deducted star was for sturdiness and durability, as all the screws in the center vertical pipe shook loose and got lost. Just keep an eye on the screws and tighten often to keep from losing them.
customer_reviews.author: JaneInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Must haves. !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over our school district. When you need them they are ready in seconds and they fold up and take up little space. Sturdy, tasteful in design, looks good at board meetings or anywhere. Easy maneuverability. Light weight. Now I have them in my home and on patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to do medium duty work for one month. First of all it came in with a large dent on one of the legs. Secondly, the nut has already disappeared from the end of the long rod in the center shelf. Now it gives me a lot of difficulty opening and closing it and it is definitely not as stable now as it should be. Not a sturdy enough product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Henne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a life saver! I work in small places sometimes where there is no place to set things down. Nowhere to put your laptop, tools, etc. This thing folds flat and rides in the back of my mid-size SUV, and expands out to be a real, usable utility cart. It holds quite a bit of weight for what it is! I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: T. Moog

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I continue to find more uses
customer_reviews.text: I am wheelchair bound but I still drive a car. My travels require me to stay in hotels and this cart is extremely useful not only to carry my items into the room, but to move items around the room as I am staying there. When I'm at home, I use it to move my laptop computer and all the accessories that attach to the laptop. It wakes life much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fly for sport

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Too Easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart to use as a coffee station. It worked beautifully for the first 6 months. The first time I moved it while it was lightly loaded, it almost tipped over because one of the wheels is bent and missing its ball bearings. I tried to fix it, but the wheel won’t come off. Now, unfortunately, it’s a useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Loana Mason

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of pop up events and needed a cart that will store easy and help me carry all my products with ease. This cart is perfect! I love how it came already assembled in the box so you don't have to put anything together. I just wish is was a little bigger but I probably should have paid attention to the measurements. But it does exactly what I needed it to do for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time, nothing was damaged. It was just super difficult to open/collapse. See picture. Every time I tried to open it, I was fighting with it. The “lock” was difficult to put in lock position. Then trying to unlock it so that I can fold it/collapse it, I smashed my hand (twice). It just wasn’t worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: tanya chavez

customer_reviews.title: Nice collapsing features, very sturdy, good for 40k
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and not too difficult to fold up. I use my for transporting figures and as an in-game sideboard for gaming. For those 40k players who are getting this and want a matching display board, check out thewhich fits almost perfectly into the space of the top shelf with a little less than an inch on either side near the handles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake Huffman

customer_reviews.title: This pruduct should be in the "cheap toys" section.
customer_reviews.text: This pruduct should be in the "cheap toys" section. 1- screws started to get loose after 5 days. fixed with loctite threadlocker 2- then the shelf attachment broke. What a shame because the concept of this product is great! Not recommended for every day work! Wish I could find a light but industrial version, like companies that make very light and strong step ladders.
customer_reviews.author: wallyghiguly

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Cart!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for rolling out to haul in groceries, set up tools to work on the car and haul the laundry baskets out to the clothesline (which is what I use it most for). It's really lightweight, folds up quickly and easily and stores in a small footprint. The hardest part is keeping the husband from stealing it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bee

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: Helped me through hip surgery recovery. Great for the bedside. Main complaint is the handles are flimsy plastic. Also, the lever system to lock it open requires a lot of force and it is easy to slip your hands and hurt yourself. A bonus would be to have slightly larger wheels for improved rolling on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Skylab Industries

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cart. It opens with one hand, so easy. Folding is easy too, though it took 2-3 times to get the hang of it. It rolls seamlessly. It was helpful to read from other customers to be careful with the load. Fits for me.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Cart
customer_reviews.text: I don't often give reviews on purchases but this rolling card has exceeded my expectations. I, like many people, am working remotely due to Covid-19. My space is limited and this has proven to be an irreplaceable tool to organize my office supplies and folders. When needed, I can easily move it to another room. I could not be happier. Out of the box, ready to use. No assembly. I have a lot of things stored on it and it does not appear to have any negative effect on its mobility. When life returns to normal and I can return to my office, this cart will have many uses, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Burks

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! Use this on a daily basis doing facilities maintenance at several different location sites,folds flat for easy loading and unloading in and out of the service vans, holds a lot of tools but not so big that it’s hard to maneuver in small office spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Property Maintenance Plus

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible design, better, stronger materials needed
customer_reviews.text: Plastic not very sturdy. Excellent collapsible design like no other, but the materials really need to be stronger. Mine came cracked, but the company quickly gave me a refund. All I had to do was print the label. This cart wouldn't be bad for light weight items but not for something heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love ! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Needed a mobile cart, that I could Please all my car detailing supplies. This work perfectly as well of been able to collapse and fall for easy storage, it also holds up to 150 pounds. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is everything they say it is.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for work. Easy to open and really folds down. Not that much money for a great cart.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for him to take to a convention. He loves it! However, do make sure that the shelves are locked. He ended up breaking some of his models because he didn't secure it. It came out of the box ready to go. All he had to do was unfold it. This is great, considering I'm the one who normally puts things together. It's not that he can't do it, he just won't. Or rather that I don't cater to his male ego and procrastination skills, which are commendable. Overall, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Hell yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! I'm a Locksmith and this folds up in back of my truck and carries all my equipment. Great cart!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Erchul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this is not a heavy-duty cart, so it's possible to overload it. There are better alternatives for heavy items, but they cost more. However, the cart does have good wheels, and it uses nuts and bolts instead of rivets, a definite plus. I'm one of those people who have lots of "projects" sitting around, waiting for me to get around to them. They used to pile up on my dining room table. Now, they all fit on this cart and are accessible. And when company comes around, I just wheel the cart into another room. Instant clean-up!
customer_reviews.author: Mister Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect folding cart
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for delivering cakes. This little cart is sturdy -- each shelf is supposed to hold 65 pounds. It easily folds to 8" flat. This will work perfectly for delivering larger, heavy cakes, and large orders of cupcakes, etc. The cart is very easy to fold flat and open. It is light weight and easy to lift/carry. EXACTLY what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: This may be my best Amazon purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this thing is awesome! First, it came out of the box fully assembled. It unfolds and locks into place easily, is super portable yet very sturdy, and it's big enough to carry a lot of stuff yet small enough to fit through normal doors. Best $97 I ever spent :)
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases of the year
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases of the year What is this cart. Straight out of the box easy to assemble. Moves around freely and is sturdy enough for my needs. Great for any space. Read the description fully and you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jst2bzy

customer_reviews.title: I use it like a dolly that then becomes my work station.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional makeup artist and brought this cart with me on a job. I could lift and open it myself with no problem. It made transporting all my heavy bags filled with equipment and products from the car into the stages super easy. It's basically a dolly that then works as a three tier table to work off of.
customer_reviews.author: thirty three

customer_reviews.title: Light yet sturdy to use already assembled cart.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for CCPD when on the road and hotel doesn't have a surface tall enough for dialysis. Very maneuverable for light load but more difficult for a heavier load. Easy to lift and store in car or closet. Was sturdy enough for my needs. Loved that the cart was already assembled. Just had to open and lock into place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Portable Cart
customer_reviews.text: One of my coworkers had one of these carts, and I followed suit and got one. They're incredibly handy, especially for a traveling technician. The 3 layered cart is useful for all sorts of tasks, and its lighter and more portable than any other work cart you'll find. Stores nicely in the back of a work vehicle. Very sturdy for how light it is, but not suitable for really heavy duty purposes.
customer_reviews.author: P. BrudererTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handy
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in a hospice situation to store supplies. It helps us keep everything we need in one area and helps keep our loved one's area neat and orderly. It also folds up nicely, so it's not taking up space when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Enke Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, after 4 months broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago for our Congregation to transport items from car to building every week. It was great at first but then I had issues opening and closing and hardware popping out where it is now unusable. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to move around the garage with spare parts and tools. This works great. Very sturdy. It has a bar that locks it open. It’s also easy to fold back up again. One good design is that when it is folded up the wheels still work so you can roll it out of the way when not in use. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rich Smith

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionized carrying items to/from our truck!
customer_reviews.text: We have to park far-enough from our apartment that making multiple trips to bring everything to/from the truck is very inconvenient, especially when the items are heavy. This cart has revolutionized what we can carry, making transportation of heavy loads easy (truck batteries, etc.) and reducing multiple trips usually to just one. It folds up and fits well into tight spaces, so it doesn't get in the way. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dylon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. It is unbelievably amazing and helpful to have. It's easily worth double what they charge. I am a field tech and have alot of small tools and equipment I use all over buildings and floors of job sites. It is fairly compact and folds flat enough to put in my back seat or trunk. It's sturdy and rolls smoothly. I showed it to my boss and he is now buying one for each of the techs. For this price I'd highly advise getting one before the company realizes they could sell it for more.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A great work cart that folds up – I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite thing! I own a retail shop, and this cart is just what I've been looking for (for years). It popped right out of the box fully assembled, it's easy to lift and manage, it folds up and opens easily, and takes up little room for storage. When I'm merchandising products (or cleaning shelves), I can load up the cart and roll it around if needed. It seems to be very sturdy (at least good enough for my purposes), and it's a nice size (not too large, but roomy enough with the three shelves). Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient.
customer_reviews.text: It's small but very easy to use and fits perfectly in any car/van. Use it for a back up when we have 2 catering deliveries at the same time and someone needs to drive their own vehicle. I do love the fact it came assembled - just pop it open and you're up and running!
customer_reviews.author: MoniMarie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase all year!
customer_reviews.text: It made my commute and set-up a breeze. It fit easily in my car. When I took it out it was so easy to unfold and lock in place while I loaded it. This is a wonderfully cart. Some of the reviews I read said it cracked on top. Well, I put heavy items on it, made several trips and had absolutely no issue. This is the best purchase that I have made all year!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: I have one and now got one for my parents. Comes assembled and folds up fairly well. Feels pretty sturdy overall and have loaded the cart up food/serving stuff without issues. Had the first one for several years so far without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, beautiful design... terrible wheels (that are replaceable if you put the effort)
customer_reviews.text: A joy to use. Compact, transportable, each shelf carries a surprising amount of weight. Frustratingly though, the wheels are horrid. WAY TOO SMALL. So much so they constantly get stuck or trip over the tiniest bumps or cracks.
customer_reviews.author: phantasy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite accessory/tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought it with the intent of moving food trays from a vehicle to a space. Shelves are just the right size for that. Now I use it every weekend to move some basic AV equipment (not speakers or anything heavy like that) from my vehicle to the building.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, stowable, and tough
customer_reviews.text: It’s durable and folds up very small. The wheels work exactly as the should and it maneuvers well (I cannot day this about other products like this). This is one of the most useful things I have ever purchased. If you live in a high rise condo or apartment with parking in the basement this, or something like it is a must-have. This has made tasks like grocery shopping or taking sporting equiptmemt to/from the car very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Scavulli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great work station. Skinny enough to fit in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koller

product_meta.title: Olympia Tools 85-188 Pack-N-Roll Folding Collapsible Service Cart, Black, 50 Lb. Load Capacity per Shelf
product_meta.description:
Style:150 lb Capacity Service Cart| Pattern Name:Service CartOlympia Tools 85-188 Collapsible Service Cart, All Purpose Utility Stroage Cart, 150LB Loading Capacity (50LB per Shelf), Four 3inch Swivel Wheels, Overal Size: D15" x W26-1/8" x H34" and Folddown size: D15" x W8" x H42"

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Olympia Tools Collapsible service cart is the only cart you need for mobile transportation and storage. The cart collapses to 8" wide for easy storage. Securely locks open and closed and features 3 levels for holding items. Handles feature dual comfort material and 3" swivel wheels with a sleek modern design. Constructed of durable, lightweight aluminum with 3-inch rubber swivel wheels. Max load is 65 lbs per level. Open Dimensions: 34" X 15" X 26-1/8" Closed Dimensions: 42" X 15" X 8". Do not stand on or ride on; keep hands clear when folding shut; follow maximum weight instructions; do not overload.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE COLLAPSIBLE CART: This service cart keep all your tools & equipment in one place when needed for maintenance responsibilities. Features a secure locking mechanism so it doesn't collapse. 150 lbs. capacity.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: It has 3 collapsible shelves designed to offer you plenty of space when moving equipment, tools, files, garden supplies & more. It can be folded down to 8 inches to store away easily.
MADE TO LAST: Our durable and long-lasting tools help you with home, garage & industrial projects. With professional-grade quality, easily repair & fix issues with our tool cabinet essentials.

THE RIGHT TOOL FOR THE JOB: We engineer a range of bolt cutters, clamps, chisels, folding carts, hammers, pliers, saws, screwdrivers, tape measures, utility knives, vises, bolt cutters, saws & wrenches.
SUPERIOR INSTRUMENTS: Olympia Tools provides quality & innovative hand & specialty tools, tool accessories & outdoor equipment for construction, woodworking, mechanical maintenance & home repair.

specifications.Included Components: Building Materials & Ladders;Trucks, Carts, Dollies & Drywall Lifts;service-carts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,708 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
